00063   View() {
00064     resolution = 0; max_resolutions = 0; min_size = 8; max_size = 0;
00065     width = 0; height = 0;
00066     view_left = 0.0; view_top = 0.0; view_width = 1.0; view_height = 1.0;
00067     requested_width = 0; requested_height = 0;
00068     contrast = 1.0;
00069     xangle = 0; yangle = 90;
00070     shaded = false; shade[0] = 0; shade[1] = 0; shade[2] = 0;
